data.text: @MiamiJorge425 Beyond the fact that there is a league requirement that location be in Miami, our new @futbolmiamimls stadium has direct accessibility via public transit (Metrorail and Tri-Rail). That is an important feature as we transition to a future less car dependent.

@Ras3c_189 @MiamiJorge425 Lol wow..  i mean this narrative is so lazy. I love Hard Rock but i dont think it is a good idea for it to be there. Plus to not be impressed with Mas? He grew his company and now it is Fortune 500. He is very impressive and im glad he is majority owner!
@MiamiJorge425 MLS is requiring the stadium be in the urban core. The MLS stadium will be soccer specific
